interface.name: ContainerPeer
interface.javadoc: The peer interface for {@link Container}. This is the parent interface for all container like widgets. The peer interfaces are intended only for use in porting the AWT. They are not intended for use by application developers, and developers should not implement peers nor invoke any of the peer methods directly on the peer instances.

Returns the insets of this container. Insets usually is the space that is occupied by things like borders.
the insets of this container
